subject: Refund vam pro
description_text:
Hello,

I recently purchased the Vam Pro, but I would like to return them because
they do not fit my pedals.
Could you please tell me what steps I need to take?
Thank you!

Best regards,
Enzo Jacob

conversations.body_text: Hi Enzo Jacob,     You will need to 3D print the mounting bracket yourself. Our products generally cannot be returned after unboxing unless there is a manufacturing defect, as the metallic paint finish easily shows signs of use and cannot be reused. Thank you for your understanding. Happy New Year!

Hello,

I don't have a printer and don't know anyone who can print it for me.

Honestly, when I bought the haptic feedback, I did so without hesitation
because I was told that your customer service was superb and that I could
easily return the product if necessary.

I am sending you photos of the box I currently have at home (in perfect
condition, unopened) with the VAM Pro to show you that I haven't touched
it. I only took out the two brake and accelerator mounts without even
installing them, because I immediately saw that it wasn't possible for me
to use them.

It's like buying shoes, taking them out of the box, and putting them right
back in without even trying them on.

I therefore ask you to please make an effort to give me a refund.

Wishing you a happy new year,

Sincerely,
Enzo Jacob

Le mer. 31 déc. 2025 à 09:53, service@simsonn.com

Hi Enzo Jacob,    We apologize for the delayed response. You may return the package to our German warehouse, and we will process your refund upon receipt and inspection. Please ensure the packaging remains intact and the product shows no signs of use, otherwise the return request will not be approved.  Gubitz GmbH (LeiXuan A211)  Hüttenkamp 12  Neumünster, Schleswig-Holstein 24536  +49 17622233089

Hello, fine, I'll send it back to you. Thank you !

Which carrier would you like to use for the return shipment ?

Best regards,
Enzo Jacob

Le dim. 4 janv. 2026 à 11:18, service@simsonn.com

Hi Enzo Jacob,  We generally cannot accept returns for products without defects. Since iron products are prone to scratches and other signs of use, we are typically unable to resell them. If your product is in perfect condition, you may return the package to our US warehouse. We will process your refund after receiving and inspecting the item. However, please ensure the packaging is intact and the product shows no signs of use—otherwise, your return request will not be approved!

Hello,

I dropped off the package at the post office today. The carrier is “La
Poste.” It will be shipped tomorrow.

Here is the tracking number (Colissimo): CC 0852 3250 7FR.

Best regards,
Enzo Jacob
